songs.title: Everybody [Album Trailer]
songs.lyrics:
[Instrumental]
[GUIDE:]
And this next piece children, as you know already know, is called "The Plaza"—painted over 300 years ago, back on Earth, by the legendary Sam Spratt, for Logic's third studio album, entitled Everybody. It was released May 5th, 2017.

[GIRL 1:]
Can we go look at it?

[GUIDE:]
Yeah!

[GIRL 2:]
It's so beautiful!

[GUIDE]
(to GIRL 2)
It is beautiful...
(to GIRL 3)
Yep?

[GIRL 3:]
Is that how people looked back then?

[GUIDE:]
That is how people looked back then, yes! Back in the day there were different creeds, nationalities, colors—but, it's all different now...
